title: WHICH Champion has the most useless passive in the game!?!?
body:
As stated, which champion do you think has the worst or most irrelevant passive in the game!?

 I am personally voting for Lissandra because she's going to build some mana either way, so it's pretty much useless

replies.body:
Personally I guess any passive that just explains a champion resource. 

But there are no bad passives. Maybe Sion.

Agreed with the champ resource passives, Swains was pretty useless until they buffed it.  Though I'd say as far as death passives go, Sions is actually pretty legit compared to those like Kog and Zyra
Only if the enemy has no cc or decides to stand still as he resurrects.

No please, you killed Sion, now go ahead and farm up that wave next to his corpse...kek

Will people ever stop this ''Sion's Passive is bad'' meme? In teamfights, it forces the enemy to waste CC/Damage on the dead Tank or scatter, making them easier to be picked off.


Sion's passive is amazing even if he doesnt get to actually hit anyone.

I think a lot of people think his passive should be useful for 1v1's as well.  You make a good point though as my best use of it has been in teamfights.  

I think a lot of people think it's bad due to lack of damage.  Course not everything is about getting kills.  I've often found myself just wailing on the tower when Sion's passive was up.  Really great for getting those last few hits.
I'm surprised Noone mentioned that syndra doesn't have one

Amumu. 

He almost never has enough time to auto his target to proc his passive, before he unloads his kit. 

If he does get his auto off, the target would, by then, have already escape.
At least I can help him in the jungle.  And still happens some of the time.

Plus the lack of mana potions may encourage mana building.
I haven't figured out which starting potion item is the best, but I'm liking the corruption flask right now
Well to be fair singed does get a decent health boost even without building mana, still the worst designed passive in the game though.

or Kog in that case too
Talon.

Definitely Zyra's passive is the worst, is a short range skill shot than does not do a lot of damage, Kog's is better because you can move where you want to explode with a little MS steroid.

{{champion:115}} 

Long range mage with a short autoattack range. Using this passive is going to get you killed more often than it's going to get you kills. The only upside is it lets you kill towers **slightly** faster, but honestly it's just not a passive for a long range mage like Ziggs.
